name: Absol
notes: All of Absol's damaging moves can critically strike. Absol's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Super Luck
skills.description: Increased Critical-Hit rate by 15%.

rsb.name: Super Luck
rsb.true_desc: Increases Critical-Hit rate by 15%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies and lowering their Defense by 15% for 2s when it hits. If this boosted attack hits only a single target, it deals increased damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies and lowering their Defense by 15% for 2s when it hits. If this boosted attack hits only a single target, it deals increased damage.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Boosted
boosted_rsb.true_desc: Hitting an enemy with a boosted auto reduces enemy defense by 15% for 2s.

skills.name: Feint
skills.description: Dash in an arc, attacking enemies that come in contact with Absol. This move ignores the defense stat and shield effects of enemies.

rsb.name: Feint
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Absol dashes in an arc, damaging all enemies hit. Absol deals damage as if enemies hit have 0 defense and bypasses shields.

upgrades.name: Night Slash
upgrades.description1: Dash in an outward arc, dealing damage to enemies. If this first attack hits, a second attack can also be performed. The second attack has the user dash straight ahead, dealing damage to enemies and increasing the user's critical-hit rate. The lower the enemies HP, the more the user's critical-hit rate is increased.
upgrades.description2: Using this move again will restore the user's HP.

rsb.name: Night Slash
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Absol dashes in an arc, damaging and slowing the first Pokémon hit. If Absol hits, this ability can be activated within 6s – allowing Absol to dash again, dealing damage to all enemies hit. The second hit also has increased critical-rate based on enemy remaining HP (the lower their HP, the higher the critical-rate).
rsb.notes: Cooldown on Hit or without recasting is 6s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Absol heals on hit, and if the damage is a critical hit, the Heal doubles.

upgrades.name: Pursuit
upgrades.description1: Dash to the designated location and quickly charge an enemy with the next basic attack. (Basic attack range is doubled while this effect is active). If the basic attack lands from behind, its damage is increased and this move's cooldown is reduced.
upgrades.description2: Increased movement speed.

rsb.name: Pursuit
rsb.label: Damage - From The Back
rsb.true_desc: Absol dashes to a location, and dashes to an enemy with its next basic attack. If Absol hits the back of the target, this ability's cooldown is reduced. If it fails to hit the back, damage is halved.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Absol gains movement speed upgrade after the initial dash.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: Slash with sharp claws in front of the user, increasing this move's critical-hit rate.

rsb.name: Slash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Absol quickly slashes in front of themself, damaging any enemy hit by the slash. Slash has an increased cricital-hit rate.

upgrades.name: Psycho Cut
upgrades.description1: Attack with blades formed by psychic power that decrease the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits. Also increases basic attack damage dealt to the affected enemy for up to 3 attacks after this move hits.
upgrades.description2: Also increases movement speed for a short time when the user gets close to the enemy that this move hit.

rsb.name: Psycho Cut
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Absol throws a wide slash in front, damaging, debuffing, and slowing enemies hit for 5s. This debuff applies extra damage the next 3 times Absol hits the debuffed Pokémon with an auto attack or a Psycho Cut.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Three slash markers are added. The first two deal 2x damage when triggered, the third deals 3x damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Absol's movespeed when near a debuffed enemy.

upgrades.name: Sucker Punch
upgrades.description1: Look for an opening to attack an enemy, decreasing the movement speed of the user and the target enemy for the duration. After a short time, charge forward to attack the enemy. However, if the user receives damage or gets attacked before it charges, attack immediately and shove the enemy.
upgrades.description2: Increases basic attack speed for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Sucker Punch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Absol attacks a target Pokémon, slowing both the target and Absol. If Absol is attacked while channeling the dash, Absol takes no damage from the attack, immediately dashes to the target, and this hit does 1.5x damage and stuns the target.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases base attack speed after a successful counter.

skills.name: Midnight Slash
skills.description: Unleashes a flurry of slashes in front of the user. This move ends by unleashing powerful blades of energy, dealing increased damage to enemies and shoves them.

rsb.name: Midnight Slash
rsb.label: Damage - First 6 Hits
rsb.true_desc: Unleash a flurry of slashes in front of Absol and become untargetable. This move ends by unleashing powerful blades of energy, dealing increased damage shoving enemies.

name: Blastoise
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike, but Blastoise has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Torrent
skills.description: When the Pokémon is at half HP or less, its Attack and Sp. Attack are increased.

rsb.name: Torrent
rsb.true_desc: Increases Attack and Sp. Attack by 20% while at half HP or less.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Blastoise’s third auto attack is empowered - dealing 3 instances of damage, slowing enemies hit and reducing Blastoise’s move cooldowns by 1 second each.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing 3 instances of damage, slowing enemies hit, and reducing Blastoise’s move cooldowns by 1 second each.
rsb.notes: When evolving into Blastoise, basic attacks instead strike twice for 50% Atk.
rsb.add1_true_desc: When evolving into Blastoise, basic attacks now strike twice for 50% Atk.

skills.name: Water Gun
skills.description: Attacks with a shot of water, shoving enemies and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Water Gun
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise shoots a jet of water in a straight line, damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit. Enemies hit are also slowed for 1 second.

upgrades.name: Hydro Pump
upgrades.description1: Has the user attack by blasing out a huge volume of water, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon and shoving them when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Increases damage dealt by this move.

rsb.name: Hydro Pump
rsb.label: Damage (3 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise shoots a large amount of water: damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Blastoise unleashes a large burst of water in a radius around themselves, damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit. Blastoise also gains a small movement speed bonus for the duration of this move.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Hydro Pump deals increased damage.

upgrades.name: Water Spout
upgrades.description1: Spouts water toward the designated location, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokémon in the area of effect for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increases damage dealt by this move.

rsb.name: Water Spout
rsb.label: Damage - Area (6 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise calls down a barrage of water in a targeted radius. Enemies within the radius are struck 6 times over its duration, damaging and slowing them.
rsb.add1_label: Damage - Area (8 Hits) During Rapid Spin
rsb.add1_true_desc: Blastoise rapidly unleashes bursts of water in a radius around themselves dealing up to 8 instances of damage over a short duration. Blastoise also gains a small movement speed bonus for the duration of this move.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Water Spout deals increased damage.
rsb.enhanced_add1_label: Damage - Area (8 Hits) During Rapid Spin

skills.name: Skull Bash
skills.description: Fiercely rams an opposing Pokémon and leaves it unable to act.

rsb.name: Skull Bash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise dashes forward damaging and stunning all enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Has the user charge forward on a wave, shoving enemies and leaving them unable to act. The user becomes immune to hindrances while using this move and can jump in a designated direction once this move ends.
upgrades.description2: Also grants a shield when this move hits.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise rides a large wave in the designated direction, damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit. Blastoise is unstoppable while surfing, and once it ends, Blastoise can jump in a designated direction. The wave continues for a short duration after Blastoise has leapt off and continues to knock back enemies hit but inflicts no damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Blastoise gains a small shield when hitting an enemy with Surf.

upgrades.name: Rapid Spin
upgrades.description1: Has the user spin rapidly, changing the mechanics of its basic attacks as well as its Hydro Pump and Water Spout moves.
upgrades.description2: Also reduces the damage the user receives while using this move.

rsb.name: Rapid Spin
rsb.label: Damage (10 hits)
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise withdraws into its shell and begins rapidly spinning, resetting the cooldown of its other move. Blastoise is unstoppable for the duration of Rapid Spin and can freely move about the battlefield. While spinning, Blastoise will damage and slow nearby enemies. Blastoise’s next basic attack after Rapid Spin ends becomes boosted. For the duration of Rapid Spin, the mechanics of Blastoise’s Basic attacks as well as Hydro Pump and Water Spout are changed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Blastoise gains a massive amount of Def and SpDef for the duration of Rapid Spin.

skills.name: Hydro Typhoon
skills.description: Has the user spout water to attack while spinning, throwing enemies in a large area. This also grants the user a shield.

rsb.name: Hydro Typhoon
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise gains a shield and sweeps powerful water jets in a large circle around itself dealing massive damage and knocking enemies hit into the air.

name: Blissey
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike, but Blissey has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Natural Cure
skills.description: Removes all status condition from the Pokémon. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered.

rsb.name: Natural Cure
rsb.true_desc: Every 6 seconds Blissey will automatically cleanse themselves. Natural Cure will activate even if Blissey has no active debuffs.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack after a set amount of time passes, dealing increased damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Whenever Natural Cure activates, Blissey's next attack will become boosted, dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Pound
skills.description: Has the user attack by pounding in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Pound
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blissey pounds in a designated direction, damaging and slowing enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Egg Bomb
upgrades.description1: Hurls an egg at the designated location. The egg then explodes, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throwing them.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when they are thrown by this move.

rsb.name: Egg Bomb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blissey hurls an egg at a location which explodes, damaging and throwing enemies in the radius.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also briefly slows enemies after they're thrown.

upgrades.name: Helping Hand
upgrades.description1: For a short time, greatly increases the user's and nearby allies movement speed and basic attack speed. While this move's effects last, all of the user's basic attacks become boosted attacks.
upgrades.description2: Increases the damage of basic attacks while this move's effects last.

rsb.name: Helping Hand
rsb.true_desc: Blissey greatly improves movement speed and basic attack speed for self and allies by 35%. During this duration, all of Blissey's basic attacks are boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases basic attack damage for all those affected by 15%.

skills.name: Heal Pulse
skills.description: Continually restores the user's and designated ally HP for a short time.

rsb.name: Heal Pulse
rsb.label: Healing (4x)
rsb.true_desc: Blissey continually restores HP as well as the HP of a designated ally for a short time.

upgrades.name: Soft Boiled
upgrades.description1: Throws an egg to an ally, restoring its HP as well as the user's HP. A maximum of 3 uses can be kept in reserve for this move and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
upgrades.description2: Increases the maximum number of uses that can be kept in reserve.

rsb.name: Soft Boiled
rsb.label: Healing
rsb.true_desc: Blissey throws an egg to an ally, healing Blissey and the designated ally. Holds 3 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Holds 4 uses in reserve instead. Cooldown is reduced by 3s.

upgrades.name: Safeguard
upgrades.description1: Blissey grants both the targeted ally and themself a shield, purging hindrances and making both immune to hindrances as long as the shield lasts.
upgrades.description2: Shield value increased.

rsb.name: Safeguard
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Blissey grants both the targeted ally and themself a shield, purging hindrances and making both immune to hindrances as long as the shield lasts.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Shield value increased.

skills.name: Bliss Assistance
skills.description: Has the user dash to the designated ally to give it an egg, granting that ally a shield and increasing its Attack and Sp. Attack for a short time. The user also intercepts a portion of the damage received by that ally for a short time. While dashing, the user throws nearby enemies and those it comes in contact with.

rsb.name: Bliss Assistance
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blissey dashes to the designated ally to give it an egg, granting that ally a shield and increasing their Attack and Sp. Attack by 20% for a short time. The user also intercepts a portion of the damage received by that ally for a short time. While dashing, the user throws nearby enemies and those it comes in contact with.

name: Charizard
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike. Charizard's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Blaze
skills.description: While at half HP or less, critical-hit rate is increased.

rsb.name: Blaze
rsb.true_desc: Increases critical hit rate by 20% while at half HP or less.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Deals continual damage. Deals increased damage to enemies that are burned and increases range when the user evolves.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage  - Basic (4x)
rsb.true_desc: Channel fire, dealing continual damage 4 times. Deal increased damage to enemies that are burned. Basic attacks gain increased range when evolving.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Boosted (4x)
boosted_rsb.true_desc: Bonus damage to burned targets when using a basic attack.

skills.name: Flame Burst
skills.description: Attack with a bursting flame. When this move hits, it leaves enemies burned and increases the user's movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Flame Burst
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charizard attacks with a bursting flame forward, exploding on the first enemy hit, dealing damage and burning enemies in a small radius. Charizard gains a small movement speed bonus when hitting an enemy. The burn lasts 4s and reduces enemy Attack by 5%.

upgrades.name: Flamethrower
upgrades.description1: Attack with an intense blast of fire. When this move hits, it leaves enemies burned and increases the user's movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage and the damage caused by burning.

rsb.name: Flamethrower
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Attacks with a blast of fire, damaging and burning enemies in a line. Charizard gains a small movement speed bonus if they hit. The burn lasts 4s and reduces enemy Attack by 5%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals increased damage.

upgrades.name: Fire Punch
upgrades.description1: Punch with a fiery fist, dealing damage and shoving enemies when it hits. Also leaves the enemies it shoves burned.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown every time a basic attack hits.

rsb.name: Fire Punch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charizard punches forward, damaging and shoving enemies in their path. The first enemy hit is burned. The burn lasts 4s and reduces enemy Attack by 5%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown reduces every time Charizard hits with a basic attack.

skills.name: Fire Spin
skills.description: Encircles enemies in the area of effect in a vortex of fire. After this move hits, it deals damage over time and decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Fire Spin
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charizard shoots a burst of fire forward, exploding on the first enemy hit or after traveling max distance, dealing damage over time and slowing enemies within the radius.

upgrades.name: Fire Blast
upgrades.description1: Blasts intense, all-consuming fire, dealing damage over time to enemies while the flames continue to burn on the ground and decreasing the movement speed of enemies for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Fire Blast
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charizard shoots a blast of fire forward, exploding on the first enemy hit or after a short distance, dealing damage over time and slowing enemies while within the radius.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals increased damage.

upgrades.name: Flare Blitz
upgrades.description1: Charge forward cloaked in fire, granting the user a shield and throwing enemies hit.
upgrades.description2: Decreases movement speed of enemies for a short time when they are thrown.

rsb.name: Flare Blitz
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charizard charges forward, shielding itself, damaging and knocking back the targeted enemy.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also slows enemies for a short time after thrown.

skills.name: Seismic Slam
skills.description: Fly up into the air, allowing the user to move freely over obstacles. While this move is being used, basic attacks deal increased damage and leave enemies burned. In addition, when dealing damage to an enemy, recover HP. Using this move again on an enemy will grab it and slam it onto the ground.

rsb.name: Seismic Slam
rsb.label: Damage - Burning (5x)
rsb.true_desc: Grab an enemy and slam it onto the ground, damaging the enemy and dealing additional damage based on their max HP. Then, fly up into the air moving freely over obstacles. While this move is active, basic attacks deal increased damage and leave enemies burned. When dealing damage to an enemy or when burning them during this move, recover HP equal to 80% of the damage dealt.

name: Cinderace
notes: Only Blaze Kick and basic attacks can critically strike. Cinderace's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Blaze
skills.description: When using a move, the next basic attack becomes a boosted attack. When hitting an enemy with a basic attack or move, a cinder is placed on that enemy. Attacking a cindered enemy a certain number of times will cause the cinder to flare, dealing damage to the enemy. When at half HP or less, critical-hit rate is increased by 10% and basic attack speed is increased by 20% for a short time.

rsb.name: Blaze
rsb.true_desc: When at half HP or less, critical-hit rate is increased by 10% and basic attack speed is increased by 20% for a short time. When hitting an enemy with a basic attack or move, a cinder is placed on that enemy for 5s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack or when using a move, dealing increased damage and adding a cinder to the enemy. Attacking a cindered enemy a certain number of times will cause the cinder to flare, dealing damage to the enemy.

skills.name: Ember
skills.description: Shoot out a small flame, dealing damage to enemies, leaving them burned and decreasing their Attack for a short time.

rsb.name: Ember
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace shoots out a small flame, damaging and applying burn to hit enemies.

upgrades.name: Pyro Ball
upgrades.description1: Kick a ball of flame in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies and leaving them burned for a short time when this move hits.
upgrades.description2: Reduces the cooldown of Flame Charge or Feint when this move hits.

rsb.name: Pyro Ball
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace kicks a ball of flame in a designated direction, burning and damaging enemies hit. The burn reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 5%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the cooldown of Flame Charge or Feint by 2s when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Blaze Kick
upgrades.description1: Perform a fiery flying kick. This move is always a critical hit, and it shoves enemies and leaves them burned for a short time. In addition, become immune to hindrances while using this move.
upgrades.description2: Increases basic attack speed for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Blaze Kick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace performs a fiery flying kick; shoving, burning, and critting enemies hit. In addition, Cinderace is immune to hindrances while using this move. The burn lasts 3s and reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 5%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Cinderace's basic attack speed for a short time after this move hits.

skills.name: Low Sweep
skills.description: Make a swift low sweep in the designated direction, dealing damage to any enemy it hits.

rsb.name: Low Sweep
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace makes a swift low sweep in the designated direction, damaging any enemy it hits.

upgrades.name: Flame Charge
upgrades.description1: Charge forward cloaked in flame, dealing damage to any enemy hit.
upgrades.description2: The next boosted attack after this move ends also decreases the movement speed of enemies hit for a short time.

rsb.name: Flame Charge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace charges forward, damaging all enemies hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The next boosted attack after this move ends also slows enemies hit for a short time.

upgrades.name: Feint
upgrades.description1: Increases movement speed for a short time and become invincible.
upgrades.description2: After this move is used, basic attacks that hit enemies restore HP (up to 3 times).

rsb.name: Feint
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace dodges, increasing movement speed and becoming briefly invincible.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: After dodging, the next 3 basic attacks that hit restore HP equal to 30% of Attack.

skills.name: Blazing Bicycle Kick
skills.description: Create a giant ball of flame and kick it toward the designated location. The ball releases a fierce shock wave that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. Also increases movement speed for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Blazing Bicycle Kick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Create a giant ball of flame and kick it toward the designated enemy for a sure hit, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Apply 2 stacks of cinder on the target. Deal additional damage if the target is burning. Consume all stacks of cinder for an increased damage multiplier. Note: Deals the most damage at 3 stacks of cinder, not the max of 4.

name: Cramorant
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike, but Cramorant has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Gulp Missile
skills.description: When Cramorant uses a move, it catches some form of prey in its mouth. Afterward, when Cramorant receives damage, it spits the prey out as a counterattack at an enemy. The type of prey and effect differ based on the user's HP.

rsb.name: Gulp Missile
rsb.true_desc: When Cramorant has prey in its mouth, it will counterattack upon taking damage from an enemy.  Alternatively, Cramorant can shoot the prey at his enemy as a boosted basic attack. The prey bounces to 1 nearby enemy.
rsb.notes: At high HP, caught prey will be Arrokuda, which deals damage to the enemy.  At low HP, the prey will be Pikachu which deals damage to the enemy and slows them.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every fourth attack. This boosted attack spits Arrokuda or other Pokémon at the enemy and deals area damage near the target when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every fourth attack. This boosted attack spits prey at the enemy and bounces to 1 nearby enemy.

skills.name: Whirlpool
skills.description: Creates a whirlpool that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. The area of effect slowly shrinks, but the damage dealt slowly increases. Just before the whirlpool disappears, it decreases the movement speed of enemies in the area of effect for a short time. The user can also catch Arrokuda or other prey by entering the whirlpool.

rsb.name: Whirlpool
rsb.label: Damage - Initial (2 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant creates a whirlpool at a designated location, damaging all enemies in the radius. It also slows enemies by 50% in the area at the end of its duration. Cramorant can enter the whirlpool to catch prey for Gulp Missile (you can catch up to 2 prey).

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Attacks with a wave that deals damage to enemies. Once the wave has traveled its full distance, it returns the way it came, dealing damage to enemies once again and pulling them back with the wave. The user can also catch Arrokuda or other prey by entering the wave.
upgrades.description2: When the first wave hits enemies, it also decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant sends a wave in a designated direction, damaging enemies that make contact with the wave. Once it reaches its full distance, the wave bounces back – further damaging and pulling back affected enemies. Cramorant catches prey with the first wave, and can enter the wave that returns to catch prey for Gulp Missile.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The wave also slows.

upgrades.name: Dive
upgrades.description1: Changes the designated area into a puddle and has the user dive to that area, dealing damage to enemies and shoving them when they're hit. The user also catches Arrokuda or other wild Pokémon as they emerge from the puddle. A maximum of 3 uses can be kept in reserve for this move.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Dive
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant turns the designated area into a puddle, then dives to that area, shoving and damaging enemies in the area. Cramorant catches prey for Gulp Missile as they emerge from the puddle. Holds 3 uses in reserve.
rsb.notes: There is a 1.5 sec cooldown between charges, which is reduced with cooldown reduction.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Feather Dance
skills.description: Decreases the Attack and movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Feather Dance
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant throws a circle of feathers at a designated area, slowing enemies by 20% in the radius and reducing their attack speed by 30%.

upgrades.name: Hurricane
upgrades.description1: Creates a fierce wind, dealing damage to enemies that get caught in it and throws them.
upgrades.description2: Increases the user's movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Hurricane
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant creates a fierce wind, damaging and throwing enemies caught in the radius.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Cramorant's speed briefly.

upgrades.name: Air Slash
upgrades.description1: Shoot out many blades of air while moving backward to create distance. Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and reduces this move's cooldown when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Restores the user's HP every time a blade of air hits an enemy.

rsb.name: Air Slash
rsb.label: Damage - per Blade (4 blades)
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant shoots many blades of air while moving backwards, dealing damage to enemies within the cone. This move's cooldown is reduced for every blade that hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Heals Cramorant every time a blade of air hits an enemy.

skills.name: Gatling Gulp Missile
skills.description: Creates a puddle at the user's current location. The user continuously uses its mouth to grab Arrokuda from the puddle and spits them out to attack the nearest enemy. The user cannot move or use other moves while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Gatling Gulp Missile
rsb.label: Damage (10x)
rsb.true_desc: Cramorant becomes unstoppable and fires a series of Arrokuda missles at the nearest enemy, becoming immobile for the entire duration. Gatling Gulp Missile can be cancelled early.

name: Crustle
notes: All of Crustle's damaging moves can critically strike, but Crustle has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Sturdy
skills.description: Gains a stacking Def/SpDef buff for every 7% HP missing. Stacks up to 10 times.

rsb.name: Sturdy
rsb.true_desc: Gains 5 + (Level - 1) Defense and Sp. Defense for every 7% of Crustle's missing HP. Stacks 10 times.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

skills.name: Rock Slide
skills.description: Drops large rocks on the designated area. When this move hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaves them unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Rock Slide
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Crustle drops rocks in a small radius, stunning enemies hit for 1s.

upgrades.name: Rock Tomb
upgrades.description1: Splits open the ground toward the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and creating a barricade of rock. Activating this move again removes the barricade.
upgrades.description2: Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Rock Tomb
rsb.label: Damage - Projectile
rsb.true_desc: Crustle emits a beam that deals 100% ability damage. Upon reaching its maximum distance, or hitting an enemy, a curved wall rises from the ground, dealing 50% ability damage to all enemies on top of it. When the barrier de-spawns, 50% ability damage is dealt again to all enemies near it.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Each hit additionally inflicts 2s of slow.

upgrades.name: Shell Smash
upgrades.description1: Convert a set percentage of Defense and Sp. Defense into Attack and Sp. Attack and increase movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased conversion rate.

rsb.name: Shell Smash
rsb.true_desc: Crustle smashes his shell, setting his Def and SpD to 0, gaining a boost to his Atk and SpA equal to 40% of the Def and SpD lost, respectively. Def and SpD not from base stats, i.e. from items and buffs (including Crustle's passive) are exempt. Crustle also gains a significant speed boost.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Def and SpD conversion is increased from 40% to 50%.

skills.name: Fury Cutter
skills.description: Slashes enemies with claws, dealing damage to them. Hitting the same enemy multiple times in succession with this move increases the damage dealt.

rsb.name: Fury Cutter
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Crustle attacks once with his claws. Enemies hit by Fury Cutter receive a debuff that causes subsequent Fury Cutter attacks to deal 20% additional damage. Maximum 2 debuff stacks. Additional damage from this debuff is always rounded up.

upgrades.name: Stealth Rock
upgrades.description1: Throws many small rocks. When a rock hits an enemy or when the rocks have flown their full distance, a zone of many levitating rocks is created dealing slowly-increasing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Increases the duration of this move's effects and decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Stealth Rock
rsb.label: Damage (8 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Crustle aims and creates a radius in which rocks hit enemies 8 times. Each hit applies a stack of a debuff which causes subsequent hits to deal 15% more damage. Additional damage from this debuff is always rounded up.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Number of hits increased from 8 to 10.

upgrades.name: X-Scissor
upgrades.description1: Dash forward with crossed claws, dealing damage to enemies multiple times and shoving them. Leaves enemies unable to act if they hit an object when shoved.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: X-Scissor
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Crustle attacks three times with his claws, dealing increased damage with each hit and knocking back enemies with each hit. Stuns for 2s if the enemy is against a wall when the third hit lands.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown reduced.

skills.name: Rubble Rouser
skills.description: Gain a shield for a short time and leave nearby enemies unable to act, dealing damage over time to them. If the user receives damage while this move is in effect, the move deals additional hits to nearby enemies.

rsb.name: Rubble Rouser
rsb.label: Damage - Revenge
rsb.true_desc: Summon a whirlwind of rocks for a short time, gaining a shield (40% max HP + 600 HP) and leaving nearby enemies unable to act. Deal damage to nearby enemies - and If Crustle receives damage while this move is in effect, deal additional revenge damage.

name: Eldegoss
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike, but Eldegoss has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Cotton Down
skills.description: Damages an enemy and decreases its movement speed for a short time after receiving a certain amount of damage. When that happens, also recover HP and gain increased movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Cotton Down
rsb.label: Damage - Revenge
rsb.true_desc: When receiving a certain amount of damage, recover HP, deal revenge damage, and decrease the enemies movement speed for a short time.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, attaching a bit of cotton fluff to the enemy. The user's basic attacks against an enemy with cotton fluff on it deal increased damage and decreases the enemies movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, attaching a bit of cotton fluff to the enemy. The user's basic attacks against an enemy with cotton fluff on it deal increased damage and decreases the enemies movement speed for a short time.

skills.name: Leafage
skills.description: Pelt the target with leaves, decreasing the movement speed of enemies for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Leafage
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Eldegoss shoots a bundle of leaves that explode on the first enemy hit, damaging and slowing in an area.

upgrades.name: Pollen Puff
upgrades.description1: Throws a Pollen Puff, which attaches to an enemy. The Pollen Puff restores HP for allies and deals damage to enemies.
upgrades.description2: If a Pollen Puff attaches to enemies, it also deals them damage over time. If a Pollen Puff attaches to an ally, it also reduces the damage they receive.

rsb.name: Pollen Puff
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Eldegoss throws a puff of pollen, which attaches to any Pokémon that touches it. After a delay the puff will explode, damaging enemies and healing allies around it.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: If attached to an enemy, the puff will deal damage over time. If attached to an ally, it will reduce the damage they receive by 20% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Leaf Tornado
upgrades.description1: Attack with a tornado of sharp leaves, leaving a path in its wake that increases ally movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the accuracy of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Leaf Tornado
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Eldegoss conjures a tornado full of leaves, which damages enemies and creates a gust of wind that increases the movement speed of allies that touch it.
rsb.add1_true_desc: 25% of the damage of the first hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemies hit by the tornado will miss all of their basic attacks for a small amount of time.

skills.name: Synthesis
skills.description: Restores the HP of the user and nearby allies.

rsb.name: Synthesis
rsb.label: Healing
rsb.true_desc: Eldegoss uses sunlight to heal itself and nearby allies.

upgrades.name: Cotton Guard
upgrades.description1: Protects the user and nearby allies with cotton. The cotton absorbs damage and when the move ends, the cotton restores some HP.
upgrades.description2: Also increases the user's movement speed while using this move.

rsb.name: Cotton Guard
rsb.label: Shielding
rsb.true_desc: Eldegoss creates barriers out of cotton, granting itself and all nearby allies a shield. When the shield expires, it restores HP equal to 30% of the remaning shield value.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also briefly increases Eldegoss's movement speed

upgrades.name: Cotton Spore
upgrades.description1: Gathers spores around the user, increasing the user's movement speed while this move is in effect. The spores burst after a short time, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect, throwing them, and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Reduced damage taken while using this move.

rsb.name: Cotton Spore
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Eldegoss channels, gathering spores while increasing its movement speed. At the end of the channel the spores are released, damaging and throwing nearby enemies into the air, then slowing them when they land.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Eldegoss gains increased defense and special defense while channeling.

skills.name: Cotton Cloud Crash
skills.description: Float into the air and become invincible. If used again, pound the ground, attacking and shoving enemies and restoring HP to allies in the area of effect.

rsb.name: Cotton Cloud Crash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Float into the air and become invincible. If used again, pound the ground, attacking and shoving enemies while restoring HP to allies in the radius.

name: Garchomp
notes: Basic attacks, Dragon Rush, and Dragon Claw can critically strike. Garchomp's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Rough Skin
skills.description: When struck by a melee attack, a portion of the damage received is reflected back at the attacker.

rsb.name: Rough Skin
rsb.true_desc: When Garchomp takes a hit from a physical attack by a melee Pokémon, a portion of that damage is also dealt to the attacker. 2s cooldown and this damage is subject to defense reduction.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every fifth attack, dealing increased damage and restoring the user's HP. Every time a basic attack or move hits an enemy, basic attack speed is increased.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Any attack or move that hits provides a boosted stack. Stacks last 4.5s and decay together. At 5 stacks, Garchomp's attack is empowered, dealing more damage, attacking 15% faster, gaining lifesteal, and dealing 10% of enemy remaining HP as damage.

skills.name: Sand Attack
skills.description: Hurls sand, narrowing the field of vision of enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time. Also increases movement speed and basic attack speed.

rsb.name: Sand Attack
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp hurls sand toward a designated area, reducing enemy visibility and slowing them for 2s. Garchomp's movement speed and basic attack speed are increased if an enemy is hit.

upgrades.name: Dig
upgrades.description1: Burrow underground and move quickly in the designated direction, jumping out when coming in contact with an enemy or when traveling the maximum distance. This jump deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them.
upgrades.description2: Damage received is reduced for a short time after jumping out of the ground.

rsb.name: Dig
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp quickly dives underground in a short dash, then bursts from the ground at the end of the designated area or beneath the first enemy hit, dealing damage in a small radius and throwing enemies into the air.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Defenses are increased by 350 for a short time after jumping out of the ground.

upgrades.name: Dragon Rush
upgrades.description1: Back up to create distance before diving to attack in the designated direction, shoving enemies. The user can use Dragon Claw while creating distance at the start of this move to create a combo attack. (This move can crit)
upgrades.description2: Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when they are shoved the maximum distance.

rsb.name: Dragon Rush
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp jumps back, and briefly channels before diving forward, dragging all enemies within a small radius to the designated area, then dealing damage in a radius. This move can critically strike. Garchomp can use Dragon Claw during the first half of the channel to provide two more hits and replace the radial damage at the end of the move with a damaging stun.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Slows enemies for a short time when they are shoved the maximum distance.

skills.name: Bulldoze
skills.description: Stomp down on the ground, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.

rsb.name: Bulldoze
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp stomps the ground forcefully, dealing damage in a radius.

upgrades.name: Earthquake
upgrades.description1: Jump high into the air and crash forcefully to the ground, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Decrease the movement speed of enemies for a short time if they are in this move's area of effect.

rsb.name: Earthquake
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp jumps and crashes forcefully to the ground, dealing damage in a wide radius. After the initial damage, two aftershocks occur in the designated area, each dealing less damage than the initial move.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Slows enemies for a short time if they are in the radius.

upgrades.name: Dragon Claw
upgrades.description1: Attack twice in front of itself using its claws. The first attack deals damage to enemies and throws them. The second attack deals increased damage. After the move ends, basic attack speed is increased for a short time. (This move can crit)
upgrades.description2: Increase damage dealt.

rsb.name: Dragon Claw
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp viciously claws everything in the designated area twice. The first attack deals damage and pushes enemies. The second attack deals increased damage, in a range slightly larger than the designated area. Basic attack speed is increased for a short time if this attack hits an enemy. This move can critically strike.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases damage dealt.

skills.name: Livid Outrage
skills.description: Has the user unleash a powerful chain attack while dashing forward. The final attack throws enemies but also leaves the user unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Livid Outrage
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp goes berzerk, taking 30% less damage and unleashing a powerful, unstoppable chain attack. Garchomp dashes and deals damage in the designated area five times, taking a brief moment to aim before every attack. Every attack has a different designated area and does more damage than the last. The fifth and final attack stuns Garchomp for .5 seconds, and throws all enemies hit into the air.

name: Gardevoir
notes: Synchronize, Confusion, Basic & Boosted Attacks, Psychic, and Moonblast all have their damage increased by 15% after Gardevoir learns Teleport. Only basic attacks can critically strike, but Gardevoir has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Synchronize
skills.description: When an enemy inflicts decreased movement speed or a damge-over-time condition on the Pokémon, the same is inflicted on that opponent. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered.

rsb.name: Synchronize
rsb.label: Damage - Reflected
rsb.true_desc: When an enemy inflicts decreased movement speed or a damage-over-time effect on Gardevoir, movement speed reduction or damage is inflicted back to the attacker, respectively. This ability has a 9s cooldown after it's triggered.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their Sp. Defense by 10% for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their Sp. Defense by 10% for a short time.

skills.name: Confusion
skills.description: Attacks straight in the designated direction.

rsb.name: Confusion
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir fires a piercing bolt, damaging enemies.

upgrades.name: Psychic
upgrades.description1: After hitting an enemy or traveling its maximum distance, deals damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed and Sp. Defense by 20%, stacking up to 3 times.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: Psychic
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir fires a blast, damaging enemies in an area on impact. The blast creates a lingering field that damages, slows, and reduces special defense.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown is reduced by 2s.

upgrades.name: Moonblast
upgrades.description1: Has the user attack while moving back to create distance. When the move's blast hits, it deals damage to enemies in a cone and leaves the enemy closest to the user unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Also grants a shield when this move is used.

rsb.name: Moonblast
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir moves back while firing a blast, stunning the first enemy hit and damaging all enemies in a cone behind it.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Grants Gardevoir a shield.

skills.name: Teleport
skills.description: Has the user warp to the designated area, increasing the damage dealt by one basic attack after warping.

rsb.name: Teleport
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir teleports to a targeted area and gains a boosted attack.

upgrades.name: Psyshock
upgrades.description1: Attacks the designated location three times. This move's cooldown is reduced each time one of these attacks hits an enemy.
upgrades.description2: Increase the damage this move deals each time one of its attacks hits.

rsb.name: Psyshock
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir channels three attacks at the targeted area, damaging enemies. Gardevoir's moves' cooldowns is reduced each time it hits an enemy.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Each hit of Psyshock also increases the damage of the next hit.

upgrades.name: Future Sight
upgrades.description1: Sets a delayed explosion. When the explosion hits an enemy, it reduces this move's cooldown.
upgrades.description2: Reset this move's cooldown when the explosion hits an enemy.

rsb.name: Future Sight
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir creates a delayed explosion at the targeted area, damaging enemies. If Future Sight hits an enemy, its cooldown is reduced by half and Gardevoir gains a burst of movement speed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown is reset on successful hits.

skills.name: Fairy Singularity
skills.description: Warps Space in the designated area, drawing in enemies to the center. Shoves and deals damage to enemies the instant the warped space disappears.

rsb.name: Fairy Singularity
rsb.label: Damage - Final Tick
rsb.true_desc: Gardevoir warps space in a large area, creating a field stunning, pulling, and damaging all enemies in the radius. When it expires, the field damages and shoves enemies.

name: Gengar
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike, but Gengar has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels. At level 5, Gengar gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when landing moves).

skills.name: Levitate
skills.description: Increases movement speed when out of combat. (8s after leaving combat)

rsb.name: Levitate
rsb.true_desc: Increases movement speed by 10% when out of combat for 8s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, lunging at an enemy and dealing damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, teleporting to an enemy (even through walls) and dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Will-o-Wisp
skills.description: Shoot multiple sinister flames, dealing damage to enemies and leaving them burned when it hits.

rsb.name: Will-o-Wisp
rsb.label: Damage - per Wisp (3 Wisps)
rsb.true_desc: Gengar shoots 3 wisps of flame in a cone, damaging and burning enemies hit. This burn reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 10%. A single enemy can only be damaged by a maximum of 2 wisps. Damage is halved if the target is burning.

upgrades.name: Shadow Ball
upgrades.description1: Hurl a shadowy blob at the target, decreasing the movement speed and Sp. Defense of enemies for a short time when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Shadow Ball
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar hurls a shadowy ball forward in a line – damaging, slowing, and reducing the SpD of enemies hit. This ball pierces through wild Pokémon.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Sludge Bomb
upgrades.description1: Hurl unsanitary sludge to the designated area, leaving enemies poisoned when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased poison duration.

rsb.name: Sludge Bomb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar hurls unsanitary sludge to the designated area, poisoning and damaging enemies over time in the radius.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased area duration by 1s (adds 2 additional ticks)

skills.name: Lick
skills.description: Attacks with the user's tongue and pulls enemies toward the user.

rsb.name: Lick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar attacks forward in a line with their tongue, damaging enemies hit, and pulling them to Gengar. The next basic attack is boosted.

upgrades.name: Dream Eater
upgrades.description1: Puts enemies to sleep when it hits. If used again while a nearby enemy is asleep, the user appears behind the target and attacks, restoring HP and reducing the cooldown of Shadow Ball or Sludge Bomb.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage and HP restored.

rsb.name: Dream Eater
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar shoots forward a mysterious orb, sleeping enemies when it hits. If used again when a nearby enemy is asleep, Gengar teleports behind them and attacks: dealing damage to the enemy, healing Gengar, and reducing the cooldown of Shadow Ball or Sludge Bomb. Before and after teleporting, the next basic attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage and healing.

upgrades.name: Hex
upgrades.description1: Disappear and move to the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect when the user reappears. If this hits an enemy that is afflicted by a status condition, it deals increased damage and its cooldown is reduced.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Hex
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar vanishes and teleports to a designated location, damaging enemies in a radius where Gengar appears. If this hits an enemy afflicted with a status condition, damage dealt is doubled and Hex cooldown is reduced. The next basic attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Phantom Ambush
skills.description: Jump to the designated area and start sneaking with increased movement speed. If this move is used again, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Phantom Ambush
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jump to the designated area and start sneaking - gaining increased movement speed, become invisible, and the next basic attack is boosted. Moves can be used while invisible, but bring you above the ground. While above the ground, become visible to the enemies. If this move is used again, deal damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time.

skills.name: Cheek Pouch
skills.description: When Greedent eats a berry, recover HP after receiving the effects of the berry. At the same time, Greedent stashes another berry in its tail. Being hit by a single attack or combination of attacks will cause a berry to drop from Greedent's tail.

rsb.name: Cheek Pouch
rsb.true_desc: When Greedent eats a berry, recover HP after receiving the effects of the berry. At the same time, Greedent stashes an Oran berry in its tail. Being hit by a single attack or combination of attacks will cause an Oran berry to drop from Greedent's tail. Berries stay on the ground for 10s.
rsb.notes: If any ally or enemy eats an Oran Berry, they heal for 60 + 2% max HP (unless the enemy is Greedent). Greedent enemies that eat an Oran Berry heal for 60 + 6 x (Level -1) + 2% max HP

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits and causing one berry to drop from Greedent's tail.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Boosted
boosted_rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits and causing one Oran berry to drop from Greedent's tail.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: Leap to the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. If this move is used while Covet is active, no area can be designated for the user to leap to. Instead, while the user is running, damage is dealt in an area to enemies in front of Greedent. If Greedent has any berries stashed, consume all of them, reducing Tackle's cooldown for each berry consumed.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Leap to the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. If this move is used while Covet is active, no area can be designated for the user to leap to. Instead, while the user is running, damage is dealt in an area to enemies in front of Greedent. If Greedent has any Oran berries stashed, consume all of them, reducing Tackle's cooldown for each berry consumed.

upgrades.name: Bullet Seed
upgrades.description1: Spit berry seeds in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. The more berries Greedent has stashed, the more damage this move deals.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Bullet Seed
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Spit berry seeds in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. The more Oran berries Greedent has stashed, the more damage this move deals.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Belch
upgrades.description1: Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. If Greedent has any berries stashed, consume all of them, reducing Belch's cooldown for each berry consumed.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Belch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. If Greedent has any Oran berries stashed, consume all of them, reducing Belch's cooldown for each berry consumed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Defense Curl
skills.description: Grants Greedent a shield for a short time. In addition, a berry will drop in front of Greedent.

rsb.name: Defense Curl
rsb.true_desc: Grants Greedent a shield (15% max HP) for a short time. In addition, an Oran berry will drop in front of Greedent.

upgrades.name: Stuff Cheeks
upgrades.description1: Greedent drops several berries, which can be eaten to recover HP. Any HP recovered that exceeds Greedent's max HP will be converted to a shield. If Greedent catches sight of a berry while using this move, movement speed is increased for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increase the number of berries dropped.

rsb.name: Stuff Cheeks
rsb.true_desc: Greedent drops several Oran berries, which can be eaten to recover HP. Any HP recovered from an Oran berry eaten within 5s that exceeds Greedent's max HP will be converted to a shield. If Greedent catches sight of a berry while using this move, movement speed is increased for a short time.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increase the number of Oran berries dropped.

upgrades.name: Covet
upgrades.description1: Greedent runs with all its might, becoming unstoppable and dealing damage to enemies hit and throwing them. While running, Greedent drops berries. Eating a dropped berry increases movement speed for a short time. The more berries eaten, the more movement speed is increased. In addition, Belch or Bullet Seed can also be used while running.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage dealt and increased frequency of berries dropping.

rsb.name: Covet
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Greedent runs with all its might, becoming unstoppable and dealing damage to enemies hit and throwing them. While running, Greedent drops Oran berries. Eating a dropped berry increases movement speed for a short time. The more berries eaten, the more movement speed is increased. In addition, Tackle, Belch or Bullet Seed can also be used while running and using this move will reset the cooldown of Tackle or Belch.
rsb.notes: This damage is mitigated by Defense.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage dealt and increased frequency of Oran berries dropping.

skills.name: Berry Belly Flop
skills.description: Greedent eats a berry to recover HP and then leaps to the designated area, dealing damage and throwing enemies within the area of effect. Greedent then eats a special berry, allowing an unlimited amount of berries to be stored for a short time and resets cooldowns of all moves.

rsb.name: Berry Belly Flop
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Greedent eats an Oran berry to recover HP and then leaps to the designated area, dealing damage and throwing enemies within the area of effect. Greedent then eats a special berry, allowing an unlimited amount of Oran berries to be stored for a short time and resets cooldowns of all moves.

name: Greninja
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike. Greninja's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Torrent
skills.description: While HP is at 50% or less, Attack and movement speed are increased.

rsb.name: Torrent
rsb.true_desc: While HP is at 50% or less, Attack is increased by 5% and movement speed is increased by 12%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack every third attack. At long range, a boosted attack deals increased damage to enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time. At close range, a boosted attack deals more damage the lower the enemies remaining HP is.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: At range, Greninja's basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Surf, Water Shuriken, or Bubble by 0.5 seconds and boosted attacks apply a slow. In melee, Greninja's basic attacks instead deal bonus damage equal to 5% missing HP (calculated as basic attack damage and subject to basic attack effects). Boosted melee attacks also dash through the primary target and increases the missing HP damage to 10%.

skills.name: Bubble
skills.description: Attack with a spray of bubbles, decreasing the movement speed of enemies when it hits.

rsb.name: Bubble
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (2 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Greninja launches 2 bubbles which pop when they hit an enemy, damaging and slowing them.

upgrades.name: Water Shuriken
upgrades.description1: Throw shurikens made of water in quick succession. Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time and restores the user's HP when it hits. Also increases the user's movement speed while using this move.
upgrades.description2: Increases the number of shurikens thrown.

rsb.name: Water Shuriken
rsb.label: Damage (per Shuriken)
rsb.true_desc: Greninja throws 3-5 shurikens made of water which explode when they hit an enemy, damaging and slowing enemies in a small area while healing Greninja.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Throws 4-6 shurikens instead.

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Ride a wave, dealing damage to enemies and restoring the user's HP. If this move knocks out an enemy, its cooldown is reset. In addition, this move deals increased damage to enemies with low HP.
upgrades.description2: Increases the amount of HP restored.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Greninja dashes on a wave, damaging enemies and healing themself for each enemy hit. Enemies below half health are dealt bonus damage, and if this move KOs an enemy the cooldown is reset.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases healing.

skills.name: Substitute
skills.description: Leaves behind a substitute doll for the user while it's moving forward.

rsb.name: Substitute
rsb.true_desc: Greninja dashes while leaving behind a targetable decoy. Greninja is unstoppable while dashing.

upgrades.name: Double Team
upgrades.description1: Quickly moves the user away from the current position, creating illusory copies of it to aid in battle.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: Double Team
rsb.true_desc: Greninja briefly vanishes before dashing and sending clones in different directions. The clones can attack nearby targets. Greninja is unstoppable while dashing.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces cooldown.

upgrades.name: Smokescreen
upgrades.description1: Creates a smokescreen and has the user roll away from its current location. Immediately afterward, the user begins sneaking and has its movement speed increased for a short time. This also makes its next basic attack a boosted attack.
upgrades.description2: Increased attack for a short time when the user stops sneaking.

rsb.name: Smokescreen
rsb.true_desc: Greninja becomes invisible, leaving behind a cloud of smoke while dashing and gaining bonus movement speed. Greninja's next attack is boosted and deals 5% increased damage. Greninja is unstoppable while dashing.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases Greninja's attack by 20% for 3s when leaving stealth.

skills.name: Waterburst Shuriken
skills.description: Throw a giant water shuriken toward the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when this move hits. The water shuriken then immediately explodes, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them. Once this move ends, the user may jump in a designated direction.

rsb.name: Waterburst Shuriken
rsb.label: Damage (2x)
rsb.true_desc: Throw a giant water shuriken toward the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when this move hits. The water shuriken then immediately explodes, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them in the air. Once this move ends, Greninja may jump in a designated direction.

name: Lucario
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike. Lucario's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Steadfast
skills.description: While at low HP, gain a shield and increased movement speed. (30s cooldown)

rsb.name: Steadfast
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: When dropping below 50% HP, gain a shield and increased movement speed for 5s (60s cooldown).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, performing a combo attack with a bone. Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, striking twice. The first attack is a normal basic attack and the second is an additional attack that can critically hit, has increased attack range, and throws enemies into the air.

skills.name: Quick Attack
skills.description: Has the user lunge forward at a speed that makes it almost invisible, dealing damage to enemies it comes in contact with.

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Lucario dashes forward, damaging all enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Extreme Speed
upgrades.description1: Charge forward with breathtaking speed. If this move hits an enemy from point-blank range, its cooldown is reset and it restores the user's HP. However, the cooldown cannot be continually reset by using this move on the same enemy multiple times in succession.
upgrades.description2: Increases Attack for a short time when this move is used.

rsb.name: Extreme Speed
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Lucario dashes forward, damaging all enemies hit and healing Lucario for each enemy hit. The first enemy hit will reset the cooldown of Extreme Speed. This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every 10 seconds. Attacking immediately after the dash will perform a unique attack in an area dealing 75% Atk and can critically hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Lucario's Attack by 15% for a short period of time after use.

upgrades.name: Power-Up Punch
upgrades.description1: Charges power before unleashing a powerful attack. While the user is charging power, its movement speed is decreased but its Attack slowly increases and the damage it receives is reduced. The user then charges in the designated direction and releases this move, dealing more damage the lower the enemies remaining HP is. The next basic attack becomes a boosted attack if the move hits. This move's cooldown is reduced every time one of the user's moves hits.
upgrades.description2: Become immune to hindrances while charging power.

rsb.name: Power-Up Punch
rsb.label: Damage - Uncharged
rsb.true_desc: Lucario begins charging power, slowing themself and reducing damage taken while preparing to unleash a devastating punch. Upon release, Lucario lunges – damaging the first enemy hit. Power-Up Punch does bonus damage based on the enemy's missing health, and will cause Lucario's next attack to be boosted. The cooldown for Power-Up Punch is reduced whenever Lucario lands a move.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Lucario is unstoppable while charging the punch.

skills.name: Meteor Mash
skills.description: Blast forward with a punch like a comet, dealing damage to enemies and shoving them.

rsb.name: Meteor Mash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Lucario punches with the force of a meteor, damaging and knocking enemies back.

upgrades.name: Bone Rush
upgrades.description1: Performs a combo attack with a bone, dealing multiple damaging blows to enemies and shoving them. The final attack sends the bone flying. If used again while the bone is traveling, the user rushes to the location of the bone, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
upgrades.description2: Using this move again will reset the cooldown for Extreme Speed or Power-Up Punch.

rsb.name: Bone Rush
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (7 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Lucario rapidly strikes with a bone, damaging enemies hit 6 times. Lucario then throws the bone after the final strike, shoving enemies and causing the bone to land a short distance away. Lucario can activate Bone Rush again to teleport to the bone, damaging enemies in a small area around it. Landing one of Bone Rush's initial strikes will reset the cooldown timer for extreme speed on that target.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Teleporting to the bone will reset the cooldown of Extreme Speed or Power-Up Punch.

upgrades.name: Close Combat
upgrades.description1: Unleash a combo attack, dealing multiple blows to enemies and shoving them.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Close Combat
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (11 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Lucario rapidly punches, damaging enemies in the area in front of them 11 times over the duration.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Damage is increased.

skills.name: Aura Cannon
skills.description: Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. Increases the damage dealt by the user's next Power-Up Punch after using this move.

rsb.name: Aura Cannon
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Aura Cannon does not have a limit to the number of times it can hit one target, rather it deals damage to enemies in its area while it travels, gaining speed. At close range, a still enemy can be hit up to 4 times and when the cannon is at max speed, a still enemy will only be struck twice. Damage of the next Power-Up Punch is increased by roughly 20%, and enemies hit by the cannon have their internal cooldown for Extreme Speed reset.

name: Machamp
notes: Only basic attacks and Cross Chop can critically strike. Machamp's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Guts
skills.description: Increases Attack when afflicted by a status condition.

rsb.name: Guts
rsb.true_desc: Increases Attack by 10% for 5s when afflicted by a status condition.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits. This boosted attack also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits. This boosted attack also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time.

skills.name: Karate Chop
skills.description: Attack opposing Pokémon with a sharp chop.

rsb.name: Karate Chop
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Machamp attacks in a straight line dealing damage to enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Close Combat
upgrades.description1: Unleash a series of punches in the designated direction, dealing increased damage with the last punch. The user can move while using this move and becomes immune to hindrances.
upgrades.description2: Deals increased damage to enemies that are afflicted by a status condition.

rsb.name: Close Combat
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (4 hits)
rsb.true_desc: Machamp unleashes a barrage of blows in a targeted direction, hitting multiple times and finishing with a single large strike. Machamp is unstoppable for the duration and can move while using close combat.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals additional damage if the target is affected by a status condition.

upgrades.name: Cross Chop
upgrades.description1: Has the user deliver a double chop with forearms crossed while dashing forward. This increases the user's critical-hit rate.
upgrades.description2: Increases Attack with each basic attack, up to a set max.

rsb.name: Cross Chop
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Machamp dashes forward dealing damage to enemies hit. Cross chop has an increased critical hit rate and can critically strike.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Machamp’s basic attacks increases Atk by 2 and stacking up to 40 times.

skills.name: Bulk Up
skills.description: Become immune to hindrances for a short time. Increases movement speed, basic attack speed, and Attack. The next basic attack also becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Bulk Up
rsb.true_desc: Machamp buffs themselves for 3 seconds increasing attack by 15%. Machamp is unstoppable for the duration and gains a small amount of attack speed and movement speed. Machamp’s next basic attack is boosted.

upgrades.name: Dynamic Punch
upgrades.description1: Jump to the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act when it hits. After using this move, the user becomes immune to hindrances, their movement speed and basic attack speed is increased. The next basic attack also becomes a boosted attack.
upgrades.description2: Increased Attack and movement speed.

rsb.name: Dynamic Punch
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick (4 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Machamp jumps to target location, briefly stunning enemies hit, slowing them, and dealing damage four times in quick succession to the landing radius. Machamp’s Atk is increased by 15% and gains bonus movement speed for 6 seconds when using Dynamic Punch.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases Atk (from 15% to 20%) and movement speed.

upgrades.name: Submission
upgrades.description1: Increases movement speed and become immune to hindrances. When the next basic attack hits, the attack deals increased damage and slams the enemy onto the ground, leaving it unable to act. Once this move ends, the user's critical-hit rate and basic attack speed are increased for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased critical-hit rate and basic attack speed.

rsb.name: Submission
rsb.label: Damage (2x)
rsb.true_desc: Machamp becomes unstoppable and gains significant movement speed for 5 seconds or until the next basic attack. Machamp’s next basic attack during submission is enhanced hitting twice and slamming the target down behind Machamp. If this attack hits Machamp also gains increased critical hit rate and attack speed for 3 seconds.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases critical hit rate and attack speed bonuses.

skills.name: Barrage Blow
skills.description: Increases the user's movement speed, Attack, Defense, and Sp. Defense for a short time. If used again, unleash a combo attack, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and shoving them. The final blow deals an especially large amount of damage.

rsb.name: Barrage Blow
rsb.label: Damage (6x)
rsb.true_desc: Increases Machamp's movement speed, Attack by 30%, Defense by 200, and Sp. Defense by 200 for a short time. If used again, unleash a combo attack, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and shoving them. The final blow deals double the damage of the previous hits.

skills.name: Thick Fat
skills.description: When Mamoswine deals damage, Defense and Sp. Def are increased for 3s, stacking up to 3 times. When Mamoswine uses Ice Shard, Icicle Crash or Ice Fang, the next basic attack is boosted. If any of these moves creates a freezing area of effect inside an ally goal zone, the goal-scoring speed of enemies is decreased.

rsb.name: Thick Fat
rsb.label: Defense & Sp. Defense
rsb.true_desc: When Mamoswine deals damage, Defense and Sp. Def are increased for 3s, stacking up to 3 times. When Mamoswine uses Ice Shard, Icicle Crash or Ice Fang, the next basic attack is boosted. If any of these moves creates a freezing area of effect inside an ally goal zone, the goal-scoring speed of enemies is decreased.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage and freezing enemies for a short time when it hits. Mamoswine's basic attacks deal increased damage for a short time to enemies recently frozen with one of Mamoswine's moves.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage and freezing enemies for a short time when it hits. Mamoswine's basic attacks deal increased damage for a short time to enemies recently frozen with one of Mamoswine's moves.

skills.name: Ice Shard
skills.description: Hurls 3 chunks of ice at the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. If an enemy is hit by all three chunks, they're left frozen for a short time.

rsb.name: Ice Shard
rsb.label: Damage - per Shard (3 shards)
rsb.true_desc: Hurls 3 chunks of ice at the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. If an enemy is hit by all three chunks, they're left frozen for a short time.

upgrades.name: Icicle Crash
upgrades.description1: Drops icicles on the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. The final icicle shatters after a set amount of time or when hit by Mamoswine's other moves or boosted attacks, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them frozen. If the icicle is shattered by Tackle or High Horsepower, the ground is covered in ice, which increases the movement speed of allies that run over it. The next basic attack is boosted.
upgrades.description2: The final icicle leaves enemies hit unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Icicle Crash
rsb.label: Damage - Small Icicles (3x)
rsb.true_desc: Drops icicles on the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. The final icicle shatters after a set amount of time or when hit by Mamoswine's other moves or boosted attacks, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them frozen. If the icicle is shattered by Tackle or High Horsepower, the ground is covered in ice, which increases the movement speed of allies that run over it. The next basic attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The final icicle leaves enemies hit unable to act for a short time.

upgrades.name: Ice Fang
upgrades.description1: Uses cold-infused fangs to throw the opposing Pokémon closest to the user, dealing damage and leaving them frozen for a short time. The user can then designate a direction to slam the thrown Pokémon forward or backward, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them frozen for a short time. The next basic attack is boosted.
upgrades.description2: Increases the area of effect in which enemies are left frozen after the slam attack.

rsb.name: Ice Fang
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Uses cold-infused fangs to throw the opposing Pokémon closest to the user, dealing damage and leaving them frozen for a short time. The user can then designate a direction to slam the thrown Pokémon forward or backward, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them frozen for a short time. The next basic attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the area of effect in which enemies are left frozen after the slam attack.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: Mamoswine rushes recklessly in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies they hit and throws them in the air.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mamoswine rushes recklessly in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies they hit and throws them in the air.

upgrades.name: High Horsepower
upgrades.description1: Mamoswine rushes recklessly in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies they hit and shove them.
