Mamoswine then stomps their feet, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaves them unable to act for a short time. This stomping deals increased damage to frozen enemies.
upgrades.description2: Increases the reckless rush's speed and the length of time enemies are left unable to act.

rsb.name: High Horsepower
rsb.label: Damage - Charge
rsb.true_desc: Mamoswine rushes recklessly in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies they hit and shove them. Mamoswine then stomps their feet, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaves them unable to act for a short time. This stomping deals increased damage to frozen enemies.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the reckless rush's speed and the length of time enemies are left unable to act.

upgrades.name: Earthquake
upgrades.description1: Mamoswine leaps up in the designated direction and lands forcefully, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and pulling them toward Mamoswine.
upgrades.description2: Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits and increases the move's pulling power.

rsb.name: Earthquake
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mamoswine leaps up in the designated direction and lands forcefully, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and pulling them toward Mamoswine.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits and increases the move's pulling power.

skills.name: Mammoth Mash
skills.description: Mamoswine jumps to the designated location and becomes immune to hindrances - then repeatedly stomps the ground, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time with each stomp. The final stomp throws enemies in the air.

rsb.name: Mammoth Mash
rsb.label: Damage - First Stomp
rsb.true_desc: Mamoswine jumps to the designated location and becomes immune to hindrances - then repeatedly stomps the ground, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time with each stomp. The final stomp throws enemies in the air.

name: Mr.Mime
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike, but Mr. Mime has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Filter
skills.description: Reduced damage received for a short time after using a move.

rsb.name: Filter
rsb.true_desc: Upon casting an ability, Mr. Mime takes 10% less damage for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and throwing enemies when it hits.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Boosted
boosted_rsb.true_desc: Every 3rd attack is boosted, dealing increased damage and throwing enemies in the air briefly.

skills.name: Fake Out
skills.description: Slap its hands together, shoving enemies in front of it.

rsb.name: Fake Out
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime claps, damaging and knocking enemies back in a cone.

upgrades.name: Confusion
upgrades.description1: Attacks straight in front of the user, dealing damage to enemies and shoving them. If an enemy shoved by this move hits an obstacle, it receives increased damage from this move and is left unable to act for a short time. If the enemy is currently guard-swapped, it is not shoved but receives increased damage from this move and is left unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Confusion
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime fires a wave of psychic energy, damaging and knocking enemies back. Enemies hit into a wall take bonus damage and are stunned. Enemies debuffed by Guard Swap take bonus damage and are stunned, but are not knocked back.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Psychic
upgrades.description1: Centers one telekinetic blast each on the user, any guard-swapped enemies, and any Light Screen or Barrier walls created by the user, damaging all enemies caught in the blasts and lowering their Sp. Defense for a short time. If an enemy is hit by multiple overlapping blasts, that enemy is also left unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Psychic
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: After a short channel, Mr. Mime creates a pulse of energy that damages enemies around themself and any target affected by Guard Swap, with a smaller pulse around any created Barriers or Light Screens. Enemies hit by more than 1 pulse are stunned.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also briefly slows.

skills.name: Light Screen
skills.description: Create a wall of light in the designated area that prevents enemies from passing.

rsb.name: Light Screen
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime creates a wall that prevents enemies from passing.

upgrades.name: Barrier
upgrades.description1: Create a translucent wall in the designated location that prevents enemies from passing. A maximum of two uses can be kept in reserve for this move and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
upgrades.description2: Increases the max number of uses that can be kept in reserve.

rsb.name: Barrier
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime creates a wall that prevents enemies from passing. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s. When upgrading Barrier, reserved Barriers will be restored to the maximum.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Stores 3 charges in reserve instead.

upgrades.name: Guard Swap
upgrades.description1: Swaps the user's Defense and Sp. Defense stats with those of another Pokémon for a short time when it hits. Swapping with an enemy deals damage over time and decreases their movement speed while increasing the user's movement speed for a short time. Swapping with an ally increases the movement speed of that ally and the user for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Also continually restores the HP of the user and the ally while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Guard Swap
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime fires a beam, swapping Defense and Sp. Defense with another Pokémon for a short time when it hits. Swapping with an enemy slows and damages them over time while increasing Mr. Mime's movement speed. Swapping with an ally increases the movement speed of that ally and Mr. Mime.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Heals Mr. Mime, plus an ally if tethered to them.

skills.name: Showtime
skills.description: Jump to the designated location and start a pantomime performance, dealing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Showtime
rsb.label: Damage - First 3 Hits
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime leaps forward and begins a performance, stunning enemies and dealing damage in a large area around him 4 times. The final hit does double damage.

name: Ninetales
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike, but Ninetales has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Snow Warning
skills.description: Causes snow to fall on an enemy, dealing damage to it and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. Boosted attacks and moves (except Aurora Veil) sling snow, and hitting the same target with snow multiple times will freeze it for a short time.

rsb.name: Snow Warning
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Causes snow to fall on an enemy, dealing damage to it and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. Boosted attacks and moves (except Aurora Veil) sling snow, and hitting the same target with snow multiple times will freeze it for a short time.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

skills.name: Powder Snow
skills.description: Attack with a chilly gust of powdery snow, decreasing the movement speed of enemies for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Powder Snow
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales attacks with a chilly gust of powdery snow, slowing and damaging enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Avalanche
upgrades.description1: Attack with a gush of chilly ice toward the designated area. The ice forms a wall that cannot be passed through on land. After a short time this wall melts and collapses, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Avalanche
rsb.label: Damage - Wind or Wall
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales attacks with a gust of chilly ice toward in designated direction. The ice damages enemies and forms a wall that can't be walked through. After a short time this wall melts and collapses, further damaging enemies in a radius around the wall.

upgrades.name: Dazzling Gleam
upgrades.description1: Attack with a powerful cone of blinding light, leaving enemies unable to act when this move hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage dealt and stun duration.

rsb.name: Dazzling Gleam
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales attacks with a powerful cone of blinding light, stunning and damaging enemies hit.

skills.name: Icy Wind
skills.description: Attack with a gust of freezing air, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Icy Wind
rsb.label: Damage (x2)
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales attacks with a gust of freezing air, damaging and slowing enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Blizzard
upgrades.description1: Summons a howling blizzard in two blasts in front of the user. The first blast deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time. The second blast deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and shoves them. If the second blast hits an obstacle, it also deals damage to enemies near the point of impact.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Blizzard
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Blast
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales summons a howling blizzard in 2 blasts in front of them (second hit double first hit damage). If the second blast hits a wall, create an area at the impact dealing 6 ticks of damage (damage per tick same as first hit).
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals twice the damage of the first hit.
rsb.enhanced_add1_true_desc: Deals twice the damage of the first hit.

upgrades.name: Aurora Veil
upgrades.description1: Create an aurora around the user, reducing damage received by the user and nearby allies in the area of effect. While the user is inside the aurora, its movement speed is increased and its basic attacks become boosted attacks.
upgrades.description2: Further reduces damage allies receive.

rsb.name: Aurora Veil
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales creates an aurora around them, reducing damage received by them and nearby allies by 30% in the aurora radius. While Ninetales is inside the aurora, movement speed is increased by 20% and all basic attacks are boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Damage reduced by 35%.

skills.name: Snow Globe
skills.description: Attacks with a chilly blast of snow and ice, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect when it hits. Deals increased damage to enemies that are frozen.

rsb.name: Snow Globe
rsb.label: Damage - Frozen Enemies
rsb.true_desc: Attack with a chilly blast of snow and ice, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect around Ninetales when it hits. Deals increased damage to enemies that are frozen.

name: Pikachu
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike, but Pikachu has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Paralyzes all enemies nearby for a short time when receiving damage. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered.

rsb.name: Static
rsb.true_desc: Paralyzes (slow) all enemies nearby for a short time when receiving damage. This ability goes on a 30s cooldown after it's triggered.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. This boosted attack also paralyzes enemies for a short time when it hits.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Boosted
boosted_rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. This boosted attack also paralyzes (slows) enemies for a short time when it hits.

skills.name: Thunder Shock
skills.description: Release electricity, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Also paralyzes enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Thunder Shock
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu releases electricity to a designated area, damaging enemies in the radius. Also paralyzes (slows) enemies for a short time.

upgrades.name: Electro Ball
upgrades.description1: Hurl an electric orb, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them paralyzed for a short time. This move's damage increases the lower the enemies remaining HP is.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Electro Ball
rsb.label: Damage - Area
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu hurls an electric orb at an enemy, paralyzing (slowing) and damaging them and nearby enemies. Damage increases as the enemies' remaining HP decreases.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Thunder
upgrades.description1: Drop wicked thunderbolts, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Increases the number of times this move attacks.

rsb.name: Thunder
rsb.label: Damage - Area (5x)
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu drops wicked thunderbolts at a designated area, damaging enemies in the radius.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the number of times this move attacks.

skills.name: Electro Web
skills.description: Attacks and captures enemies using an electric net, leaving them unable to move.

rsb.name: Electro Web
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu attacks and captures enemies using an electric net, rooting them.

upgrades.name: Volt Tackle
upgrades.description1: Has the user electrify itself and charge ahead, throwing opposing Pokémon.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: Volt Tackle
rsb.label: Damage (5x)
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu electrifies themself and charges ahead becoming unstoppable, throwing and damaging enemies hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduced cooldown.

upgrades.name: Thunderbolt
upgrades.description1: Attack with a strong electric blast, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Thunderbolt
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu attacks with a strong electric blast at a designated area, stunning and damaging enemies in the area.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.description: Attacks enemies near the user with tremendous bolts of lightning.

rsb.name: Thunderstorm
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Four bolts of lightning strike 4 times over 3 seconds. The first strike hits all enemies in the radius, and the next three strikes hit a random enemy within radius.

name: Slowbro
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike, but Slowbro has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Oblivious
skills.description: When Slowbro receives damage, the HP loss is gradual. When damaging an opponent with a move, restore some of the remaining gradual HP loss and decrease the target's Sp. Defense.

rsb.name: Oblivious
rsb.true_desc: Damage taken is converted to blue HP, which goes away after a few seconds. When hitting an enemy, some of Slowbro's blue HP is restored and the target loses 4% Sp. Def, stacking up to 20%. When using a move that buffs or heals Slowbro, restore some of Slowbro's blue HP.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, deal damage to nearby opposing Pokémon and decrease their movement speed.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, deal damage to nearby enemies and decrease their movement speed.

skills.name: Water Gun
skills.description: Slowbro channels a fierce stream of water which deals damage and lowers movement speed. Increase the area of effect and damage the longer this move is channeled.

rsb.name: Water Gun
rsb.label: Damage - Uncharged
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro fires a stream of water, damaging and slowing enemies hit. This move can be channeled to increase its range and damage.

upgrades.name: Scald
upgrades.description1: Deal damage to opposing Pokémon and create steam when it hits. Opposing Pokémon inside the steam's area are left burned and have their movement speed decreased.
upgrades.description2: Increased area of effect.

rsb.name: Scald
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (3 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro fires a stream of boiling water, damaging enemies hit; creating a cloud of stream at the location of the first enemy hit, which slows and applies burn to all enemies inside. This burn reduces Attack by 30%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the size of the steam cloud.

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Charge forward on a wave, dealing damage in an area and knock opponents back. This is followed by two more waves that deal damage and decrease enemy movement speed.
upgrades.description2: The second and third waves become larger and also knock enemies back like the first wave.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage - per Wave (3 Waves)
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro rides on a wave, damaging, knocking enemies back, and throwing them in the air briefly. Two more waves follow after the first, damaging and slowing enemies.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The second and third waves will now also throw enemies in the air, and the second wave will knock them back.

skills.name: Slack Off
skills.description: Lay down and take a rest, continuously regaining health. Damage taken will reduce the recovery effect.

rsb.name: Slack Off
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro takes a nap, healing over the duration. Taking damage during the channel will reduce the amount healed.

upgrades.name: Amnesia
upgrades.description1: Nullify some damage before it takes effect. For a short time after using this move, become immune to hindrances and gain increased defense. Also increase the damage dealt by the next use of Scald or Surf.
upgrades.description2: Increases Sp. Attack.

rsb.name: Amnesia
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro briefly becomes unstoppable, gaining +300 Defense for 4s, healing 22.5% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) 3 times, and gains 10% bonus damage on the next Surf or Scald used.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases Slowbro's Sp. Attack by 15%.

upgrades.name: Telekinesis
upgrades.description1: Make opposing Pokémon float with psychic power. If used again, pull the opposing Pokémon toward the user.
upgrades.description2: Increased range and firing speed.

rsb.name: Telekinesis
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro shoots a beam, causing the first enemy hit to float in the air  restoring 15% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP). Slowbro can reactivate the ability to pull the enemy to them, but otherwise cannot act for the duration.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the range and speed of the beam.

skills.name: Slowbeam
skills.description: Stare at an enemy and attack continually, dealing damage and rooting them. Grants a shield and makes the user immune to hindrances while using this move.

rsb.name: Slowbeam
rsb.label: Damage (x6)
rsb.true_desc: Stare at an enemy and attack continually, dealing damage and rooting them. Grants a shield (40% max HP + 600 HP) and makes the user immune to hindrances while using this move.

name: Snorlax
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike, but Snorlax has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Gluttony
skills.description: Increases the effects gained from eating Berries.

rsb.name: Gluttony
rsb.true_desc: Increases the effects gained from eating berries. 25% increased movement speed when near berries and doubles the amount healed from the Sitrus berry (yellow berry).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: Charge forward belly first, dealing damage when it hits and shoving the first enemy it comes in contact with. After this move, the user's next basic attack becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax dashes a short distance forward, dealing damage and stunning the first target hit. Snorlax’s next basic attack is boosted.

upgrades.name: Heavy Slam
upgrades.description1: Has the user slam its heavy body down, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throwing them.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Heavy Slam
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax jumps to target location, dealing damage and throwing enemies within the landing radius into the air briefly.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals increased damage.

upgrades.name: Flail
upgrades.description1: Has the user flail about, increasing the user's basic attack damage the lower the user's HP is.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage. If the user has low HP while using this move, its basic attacks that hit enemies will restore the user's HP.

rsb.name: Flail
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax buffs themselves for 4 seconds causing basic attacks to deal increased damage. Damage increase is strengthened for every 20% HP Snorlax is missing. Snorlax also gains a short burst of increased movement speed when Flail is activated.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals increased damage and causes Snorlax’s basic attacks to also heal them while they are below 40% MaxHP.

skills.name: Rest
skills.description: Has the user fall asleep on the spot and restores its HP. Blocks the movement of all enemies while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Rest
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax falls asleep for a short duration, healing 3 times for 8% Max HP. While asleep other Pokémon cannot pass through Snorlax’s hitbox.

upgrades.name: Block
upgrades.description1: Has the user spread its arms wide to create a wall and grants it a shield. Prevents enemies from passing through the wall and shoves them if they run into it.
upgrades.description2: Reduces the damage the user receives while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Block
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax creates and holds a wall in a targeted direction for 4 seconds and gains a shield. The shield lasts 3.75 sec even if Block is cancelled early. Enemies that contact the wall are knocked back and stunned. Snorlax cannot attack or use abilities while Blocking but can move slowly. While Blocking Snorlax’s Def and SpDef are increased by 25%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: No Difference.

upgrades.name: Yawn
upgrades.description1: Has the user let loose a huge yawn that lulls enemies into a sleepy haze, putting enemies hit by this move to sleep.
upgrades.description2: Decrease the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Yawn
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax sends out a slow short-range projectile that puts all targets hit to Sleep for 2 seconds.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Targets are also slowed for 3s upon waking up.

skills.name: Power Nap
skills.description: Go to sleep and begin snoring, dealing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and throw them. While sleeping, become immune to hindrances and continually restore HP.

rsb.name: Power Nap
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Go to sleep and begin snoring, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them in the air. While sleeping, become immune to hindrances, deal damage over time to nearby enemies, and continually restore 7% of max HP, 9 times.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals 50% of the initial damage, 3 times.

skills.name: Adaptability
skills.description: Every time Eevee deals or receives damage, increase Sp. Attack by 5% for 1.5s, stacking up to 4 times. Every time Sylveon deals or receives damage, increase Sp. Atk and Sp. Defense by 2.5% for 1.5s, stacking up to 6 times.

rsb.name: Adaptability
rsb.true_desc: Every time Eevee deals or receives damage, increase Sp. Attack by 5% for 1.5s, stacking up to 4 times. Every time Sylveon deals or receives damage, increase Sp. Atk and Sp. Defense by 2.5% for 1.5s, stacking up to 6 times.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. In addition - after evolving into Sylveon - increase movement speed when this boosted attack hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. In addition - after evolving into Sylveon - increase movement speed when this boosted attack hits.

skills.name: Swift
skills.description: Shoots star-shaped rays at enemies, dealing damage to them.

rsb.name: Swift
rsb.label: Damage - per Star (4 stars)
rsb.true_desc: Shoots star-shaped rays at enemies, dealing damage to them.

upgrades.name: Mystical Fire
upgrades.description1: Create four small flames while leaping in the designated direction. The flames shoot toward enemies one by one, dealing damage and decreasing their Sp. Attack by 15% for 4s, stacks up to 4 times. Each time a flame hits, reduce the cooldown of this move and after the first flame hits, subsequent flames deal 25% damage.
upgrades.description2: Increases the number of flames by one.

rsb.name: Mystical Fire
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Create four small flames while leaping in the designated direction. The flames shoot toward enemies one by one, dealing damage and decreasing their Sp. Attack by 15% for 1s, stacking up to 4 times. Each time a flame hits, reduce the cooldown of this move and after the first flame hits, subsequent flames on the same target deal 25% damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the number of flames by one.

upgrades.name: Hyper Voice
upgrades.description1: Unleashes an attack of multiple sound waves that deal damage when they hit. The damage dealt increases the farther the target is from Sylveon. Every time a sound wave hits, enemy Sp. Defense is reduced by 50 and the next sound wave's damage increases.
upgrades.description2: Increases the number of sound waves by one.

rsb.name: Hyper Voice
rsb.label: Damage - Near (6x)
rsb.true_desc: Unleashes an attack of multiple sound waves that deal damage when they hit. The damage dealt increases the farther the target is from Sylveon. Every sound wave reduces enemy Sp. Defense by 20% (stacking up to 4 times at 80%) after dealing damage to an enemy.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the number of sound waves by one.

skills.name: Baby Doll Eyes
skills.description: Stare at an enemy with baby-doll eyes, dealing damage and decreasing their Attack and movement speed for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Baby Doll Eyes
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Stare at an enemy with baby-doll eyes, dealing damage and decreasing their Attack and movement speed for a short time when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Draining Kiss
upgrades.description1: Blow a kiss at an enemy that goes back and forth between Sylveon and the target multiple times. When the kiss touches Sylveon, restore  HP. When it hits the enemy, deal damage and decrease their movement speed for a short time. If Sylveon and the enemy move too far away from each other, the kiss will disappear faster than normal.
upgrades.description2: Increases the amount of HP this move restores.

rsb.name: Draining Kiss
rsb.label: Damge (3x)
rsb.true_desc: Blow a kiss at an enemy that goes back and forth between Sylveon and the target multiple times. When the kiss touches Sylveon, restore  HP. When it hits the enemy, deal damage and decrease their movement speed for a short time. If Sylveon and the enemy move too far away from each other, the kiss will disappear faster than normal.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the amount of HP this move restores.

upgrades.name: Calm Mind
upgrades.description1: Sylveon quietly focuses their mind and calms their spirit, increasing movement speed, Sp. Attack by 40% and Sp. Defense by 10% for a short time.
upgrades.description2: One time only while using this move, if Sylveon is hit by an Enemy's move, the damage is completely nulliffied and Sylveon is granted a shield.

rsb.name: Calm Mind
rsb.true_desc: Sylveon quietly focuses their mind and calms their spirit, increasing movement speed, Sp. Attack by 40% and Sp. Defense by 10% for a short time.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Up to 3s after using this move, if Sylveon is hit by an Enemy's move, the damage is completely nullified and Sylveon is granted a shield.

skills.name: Fairy Frolic
skills.description: Jump into the air and become briefly invincible. The moment Sylveon lands, deal damage to enemies in the area of effect and restore Sylveon's HP. For 10s afterward, 50% of damage dealt by Sylveon is converted into HP (basic attacks are excluded).

rsb.name: Fairy Frolic
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jump into the air and become briefly invincible. The moment Sylveon lands, deal damage to enemies in the area of effect and restore Sylveon's HP. For 10s afterward, 50% of damage dealt by Sylveon is converted into HP (basic attacks are excluded).

name: Talonflame
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike. Talonflame's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Gale Wings
skills.description: While at high HP, movement speed is increased.

rsb.name: Gale Wings
rsb.true_desc: While above 85% HP, movement speed is increased by 10%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack every third attack, creating a fiery whirlwind that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. This boosted attack remains readied even after leaving combat for a prolonged period of time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack every third attack, creating a fiery whirlwind that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. This boosted attack remains readied even after leaving combat.

skills.name: Peck
skills.description: Fly toward an enemy and attack 3 times.

rsb.name: Peck
rsb.label: Damage (3x)
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame flies toward a target Pokémon and attacks it three times.

upgrades.name: Flame Charge
upgrades.description1: Fly in the designated direction while cloaked in flame, attacking enemies in the path. This also increases the movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: For a short time after this move hits, Talonflame's abilities and basic attacks partially ignore the enemies defense.

rsb.name: Flame Charge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame dashes forward, damaging enemies in its path. Talonflame gains a speed boost after the dash.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: For a short time after this move hits, Talonflame's abilities and basic attacks partially ignore the enemies defense for the next 3s (capped at 0) and enemies hit are slowed by 30% for 5 seconds.

upgrades.name: Aerial Ace
upgrades.description1: Fly at the designated enemy, dealing damage. Also makes the next basic attack a boosted attack.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage dealt.

rsb.name: Aerial Ace
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame dashes through a targeted enemy, damaging it. Talonflame's next basic attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Acrobatics
skills.description: Fly toward the designated area and attack multiple times. Escape in a direction of your choice after using this move.

rsb.name: Acrobatics
rsb.label: Damage (3x)
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame flies toward a targeted area, attacking all Pokémon in the area up to three times. Talonflame can choose a direction to dash after the move ends.

upgrades.name: Fly
upgrades.description1: Fly up into the sky. Using this move again will cause you to dive to the designated area and attack, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Your next basic attack becomes a boosted attack.
upgrades.description2: Also throws enemies when this move hits.

rsb.name: Fly
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame flies up into the sky, becoming untargetable. After 3 seconds, Talonflame dives at the targeted area, damaging all enemies in the area. Fly can be recast to dive early.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemies hit are also knocked up.

upgrades.name: Brave Bird
upgrades.description1: Dive to the designated location while cloaked in flame, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Also deals recoil damage to the user when it hits. Performing a boosted attack within a set amount of time after this move hits will reset the cooldown of Flame Charge or Aerial Ace.
upgrades.description2: Deals less recoil damage when this move hits.

rsb.name: Brave Bird
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame dives at the targeted area, taking 5% of remaining HP as recoil damage and damaging all enemies in the area. If Talonflame uses a boosted basic attack on an enemy hit by Brave Bird within 4 seconds, the cooldown of Flame Charge or Aerial Ace is reset. The cooldown of Flame Charge and Aerial Ace can only be reset once per target hit by Brave bird.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Talonflame takes 15% less damage for 5 seconds when this move hits.

skills.name: Flame Sweep
skills.description: Perform an aerial somersault before charging forawrd, dealing damage to enemies in this move's path and shoving them.

rsb.name: Flame Sweep
rsb.label: Damage (2x)
rsb.true_desc: Talonflame charges forward, damaging and shoving all enemies in its path. Flame Sweep deals damage up to 2 times.

name: Venusaur
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike, but Venusaur has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Overgrow
skills.description: When HP is low, increases all damage dealt.

rsb.name: Overgrow
rsb.true_desc: When HP is 30% or less, increase all damage dealt by 20%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. This boosted attack also pulls enemies inward between the vines.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Boosted (2x)
boosted_rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, becoming a vine whip that strikes twice and pulls enemies between both vines.

skills.name: Seed Bomb
skills.description: Hurl a large seed at the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.

rsb.name: Seed Bomb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur hurls a large seed to the designated location, damaging all enemies in the radius.

upgrades.name: Sludge Bomb
upgrades.description1: Hurl unsanitary sludge to the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect, leaving them poisoned and decreasing their movement speed and Sp. Defense for a short time
upgrades.description2: Increased area of effect.

rsb.name: Sludge Bomb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur hurls toxic sludge to the designated location, damaging and poisoning all enemies in the radius when it lands. The sludge lingers, damaging enemies over time in the radius, slowing them, and reducing their Sp. Def for a short time.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the radius.

upgrades.name: Giga Drain
upgrades.description1: Drain HP from enemies in the area of effect, dealing damage to them and restoring HP when this hits. Also reduces damage received for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increases amount of HP restored.

rsb.name: Giga Drain
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur emits a cone-shaped blast in the designated direction, damaging enemies and restoring health when it hits. Venusaur also takes 35% reduced damage for a short time.
rsb.notes: This move's healing is not increased by Venusaur's passive.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Healing increased.

skills.name: Razor Leaf
skills.description: Launch many sharp-edged leaves in a quick succession of attacks, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.

rsb.name: Razor Leaf
rsb.label: Damage (10x)
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur launches a barrage of sharp-edged leaves in the designated direction, damaging enemies over time.

upgrades.name: Solar Beam
upgrades.description1: Blast a bundled beam of light, dealing damage to enemies in a line.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: Solar Beam
rsb.label: Damage (5 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur fires a beam of light in the designated direction, damaging enemies over time. It is divided into four distinct hits, with ten damaging ticks randomly divided among these four hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces cast time and cooldown.

upgrades.name: Petal Dance
upgrades.description1: Scatter petals around the user, increasing movement speed for a short time and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Increased area of effect.

rsb.name: Petal Dance
rsb.label: Damage - Aura (16 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur scatters petals around themself for 5s, increasing movement speed and damaging enemies over time in the radius. Petal dance reduces the cooldown of Sludge Bomb or Giga Drain by 30% of the current remaining cooldown, per tick of damage that hit an enemy Pokémon (not wilds, and hitting multiples enemies reduces the cooldown more).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the radius.

skills.name: Verdant Anger
skills.description: Launches a giant seed toward the designated area. The seed then splits apart, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Verdant Anger
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur hurls a massive seed to the designated location, damaging all enemies in the radius. The seed then splits apart into 4 smaller seeds, each damaging all enemies in their radius.

name: Wigglytuff
notes: All of Wigglytuff's damaging moves can critically strike, but Wigglytuff has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Cute Charm
skills.description: When hit by an enemies attack at close range, make that enemy infatuated for a short time. Infatuated enemies become enthralled and approach Wigglytuff against their will. The effects of this ability have a cooldown and cannot trigger on the same enemy in quick succession.

rsb.name: Cute Charm
rsb.true_desc: When hit by an enemy attack at close range, make that enemy infatuated for a short time. Infatuated enemies become enthralled and approach Wigglytuff against their will. The effects of this ability have a cooldown and cannot trigger on the same enemy in quick succession.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies and spinning them around when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Auto
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies and spinning them around when it hits.

skills.name: Pound
skills.description: Perform a combo attack in front, dealing damage to enemies and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when the attack hits.

rsb.name: Pound
rsb.label: Damage - per Slap
rsb.true_desc: Wigglytuff slaps the area in front of them twice, damaging and slowing enemies in a cone.

upgrades.name: Double Slap
upgrades.description1: Perform a combo attack in front, dealing damage to enemies and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when the attack hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased number of attacks.

rsb.name: Double Slap
rsb.label: Damage - per Slap
rsb.true_desc: Wigglytuff unleashes a barrage of slaps, damaging and slowing enemies in a cone 3-5 times.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Slaps 4-6 times instead.

upgrades.name: Dazzling Gleam
upgrades.description1: Emit a powerful flash in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect twice.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when the first hit of this move deals damage to them.

rsb.name: Dazzling Gleam
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Wigglytuff emits a flash of fairy energy, dealing a small amount of damage in a cone followed by a large amount of damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Slows enemies hit by the first flash.

skills.name: Defense Curl
skills.description: Perform a quick roll, granting the user a shield and throwing any enemies hit by the roll. Hitting an obstacle while rolling will change the direction the user is moving and reset the cooldown of Pound, Double Slap, or Dazzling Gleam.

rsb.name: Defense Curl
rsb.true_desc: Wigglytuff gains a shield and rolls forward a short distance, throwing enemies hit. Hitting an obstacle while rolling will change the direction Wigglytuff is moving and reset the cooldown of Pound, Double Slap, or Dazzling Gleam.

upgrades.name: Rollout
upgrades.description1: Perform a quick roll, granting the user a shield. Also deals damage to enemies hit by the roll and throws them. Hitting an obstacle while rolling will change the direction the user is moving and reset the cooldown of Pound, Double Slap, or Dazzling Gleam.
upgrades.description2: Increases the length of time enemies are thrown.

rsb.name: Rollout
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit
rsb.true_desc: Wigglytuff gains a shield and rolls forward, damaging and throwing enemies hit. Hitting an obstacle while rolling will change the direction Wigglytuff is moving up to 5 times and reset the cooldown of Pound, Double Slap, or Dazzling Gleam.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the amount of time enemies are thrown.

upgrades.name: Sing
upgrades.description1: Has the user sing, decreasing the movement speed of nearby enemies for a short time. Enemies that stay in the move's area of effect for a while are put to sleep for a short time, which also decreases their Defense and Sp. Defense.
upgrades.description2: Increased sleep duration.

rsb.name: Sing
rsb.true_desc: Wigglytuff begins singing, slowing enemies around them. Enemies that stay inside the song's effect for too long will be put to sleep, and have their defense and special defense reduced for a short time.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the amount of time enemies are asleep.

skills.name: Starlight Recital
skills.description: Begin performing a recital, granting the user and nearby allies a shield as well as removing all status conditions from the affected allies and make them immune to hindrances for a short time.

rsb.name: Starlight Recital
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Begin performing a recital, granting Wigglytuff and nearby allies a shield as well as removing all status conditions from the affected allies and granting them immunity to hindrances for a short time.

name: Zeraora
notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike. Zeraora's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Volt Absorb
skills.description: Gain an electric charge when receiving damage, converting a portion of that damage into additional Attack.

rsb.name: Volt Absorb
rsb.true_desc: Converts 8% of the damage Zeraora was dealt in the last 4 seconds as Atk, up to 200 Atk.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and paralyzing the enemy while restoring some of Zeraora's HP.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and paralyzing the enemy while restoring 10% of Zeraora's missing HP.

skills.name: Agility
skills.description: Perform a quick dash and increase basic attack speed for a short time afterward.

rsb.name: Agility
rsb.true_desc: Zeraora quickly dashes forward, increasing basic attack speed for a short duration.

upgrades.name: Volt Switch
upgrades.description1: Perform a high-speed dash, dealing damage to enemies hit and increase basic attack speed for a short time. Using this move again within a set period of time will allow the user to immediately dash back to the original position.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage and basic attack speed buff duration.

rsb.name: Volt Switch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Zeraora charges forward, damaging enemies in their path and increasing their basic attack speed for a short time. Activating this ability again before it expires will teleport Zeraora to their original location.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage and longer duration of increased basic attack speed.

upgrades.name: Spark
upgrades.description1: Leap at an enemy dealing damage to them. If using your basic attack before reaching the targeted enemy, instead leap at the closest enemy and deal damage to it. This move can be used 3 times before going on cooldown.
upgrades.description2: Also restore HP if performing a basic attack before reaching the targeted enemy.

rsb.name: Spark
rsb.label: Damage - Jump
rsb.true_desc: Zeraora leaps in a selected direction, damaging enemies in their path. If a basic attack is used before the leap ends, Zeraora will jump to the closest enemy, dealing damage. Holds 3 uses in reserve.
rsb.add1_true_desc: If a basic attack is used before the leap ends, deal 170% Atk as damage instead.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: HP is restored if the user performs a basic attack before reaching the enemy.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: Pounce at an enemy and attack with sharp claws. This move's final attack throws enemies.

rsb.name: Slash
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (3 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Zeraora charges toward an enemy and attacks them with multiple swipes, ending with an interrupt that knocks the enemy into the air.

upgrades.name: Discharge
upgrades.description1: Release an electrical discharge, dealing damage to nearby enemies and grant the user a shield when it hits. If this move hits enemies that are paralyzed, it pulls them in toward the user once the move ends, dealing damage to them once again and leaving them unable to act.
upgrades.description2: Decreases movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Discharge
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick (6 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Zeraora emits an electric aura, damaging all enemies within the aura and granting a shield to Zeraora when it hits. Any paralyzed enemies within the area of effect are pulled towards Zeraora when the move ends, damaging and stunning them.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemies hit are slowed.

upgrades.name: Wild Charge
upgrades.description1: Charge in the designated direction. If this move hits an enemy, unleash a combo attack that also deals a set amount of damage to itself. If the user hit an enemy with Volt Switch, Spark, or a boosted attack before using this move, the number of attacks in the combo is increased.
upgrades.description2: Also deals damage to nearby enemies when this hits.

rsb.name: Wild Charge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Zeraora charges towards an enemy, damaging them and switching to the nearest enemy if the initial target's HP drops to zero. Hitting enemies with abilities or boosted attacks previously within a set time provides up to 3 stacks, each stack adding an additional hit to Wild Charge. The first hit deals full damage and subsequent hits deal half damage.
rsb.notes: Zeraora takes 1% remaining HP (per hit) as physical damage upon use. The first hit deals 2 instances of recoil damage and subsequent hits deal only 1.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals damage to nearby enemies when it hits.

skills.name: Plasma Gale
skills.description: Unleash a blast of lightning, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throw them. This also creates a zone of plasma that increases the user's basic attack range and damage dealt while inside this zone.

rsb.name: Plasma Gale
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Launches a bolt of lightning that travels towards the enemy, dealing damage in an area of effect and knocking all enemies hit into the air. Creates a temporary area of electricity centered on the initial target that increases Zeraora's basic attack damage by 20% while inside the area.
